level.heading: DRUG UTILIZATION REVIEW BOARD (DUR BOARD) (ยง 29-2714)

level.text: 2714.1 Pursuant to the requirements established by 42 C.F.R. part 456, subpart K, the District of Columbia has established the Drug Utilization Review Board (DUR Board).
The DUR Board shall ensure that prescribed drugs are clinically appropriate, medically necessary, cost effective, and not fraudulently obtained or prescribed.
The DUR Board shall evaluate and develop guidelines for beneficiary inclusion to the fee-for service pharmacy lock-in program.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 2298, 2311 (March 23, 2012).
